website_summaries.verdict: The Reebok Walk Ultra 6 DMX Max was a go-to walking shoe for consumers who partake in frequent long walks or whose jobs require them to be on their feet the whole day. They gave high ratings to the footwear for its comfortable construction, stable platform, durable materials, adequate cushioning, and affordable price.Not everyone was content with the model, however. They picked apart the seemingly flimsy materials and insufficient cushioning. But the overall verdict for the shoe is that it is a solid cozy and well-fitting pair for its price.
pros: The consumers across the board agreed that the Reebok Walk Ultra 6 DMX Max was a comfortable shoe for walks and jobs that involve long hours of standing up
Many users were pleased that it had a supportive platform to keep the foot steady
The footwear seemed to be made from quality materials, according to a handful of reviewers
Plenty of testers enjoyed the plush cushioning
It had a decent price, based on numerous budget-conscious individuals
A few buyers noted that the footgear ran true to size
Some purchasers were delighted that it had various width options for wide feet
Several wearers complimented its stylish appearance
Those who suffer from different foot conditions liked that the pair alleviated foot pain
Narrow-footed people appreciated the width of the B - Medium profile
cons: A small number of detractors scrutinized its seemingly cheap materials, particularly, the insole that bunched up and went out of place
A couple of naysayers felt that the cushioning was lacking

customer_reviews.title: This is not the DMX max mania that many of us have come to love over the past 20 years.
customer_reviews.text: This series of shoe is the line I've been wearing for over 2 decades. I don't know if Reebok has made these changes, or this new line is a fake knockoff. But this last shipment I received, are not the genuine model I have been dedicated to for so long. The material it's constructed from is different. All the breather holes have been eliminated. I have not worn these yet, as I and seriously considering returning them, and begin looking for a replacement/alternative. I am saddened to say this because I have been such a long term and loyal fan of Reebok for almost 30 years.
customer_reviews.author: ctaylward

customer_reviews.title: "Cushiony Bounce" not found in any other walking sneakers.
customer_reviews.text: After purchasing similar versions of this shoe at least four times, I wanted a change, and elected to buy walking shoes made by Saucony. I wouldn't say they were a disaster, but they certainly weren't as comfortable as the Reeboks, and took a way too long to "break in". Walking sneakers have become a rare commodity - there aren't many acceptable choices. When the Sauconys wore out, I didn't hesitate to go back to the Reeboks. I haven't found their comfortable "cushiony bounce" available in any other shoe.
customer_reviews.author: PBL

customer_reviews.title: Greatest shoe ever made. IMO
customer_reviews.text: I have been wearing this brand and style shoe for 30 years. In my opinion, it’s the most comfortable shoe ever made. Well made, last for years and look good. What more could you ask for.
customer_reviews.author: J R KTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Wait for the next version!
customer_reviews.text: Have been wearing DMX Ultras for many years. This 6th version is apparently made in another country- they run SMALL and the air cushioning is BARELY detectable- VERY disappointing. I'd rather pay more and get the quality it used to be. They have also closed many of their outlet stores, also very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable shoes
customer_reviews.text: With the air pocket on the sole, these shoes are comfortable to wear all day, even if you are on your feet the whole time. I cannot find them in the store that I have been buying them from, but was able to find them on Amazon. They last for years, but like all shoes, they do wear out eventually.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Rizzo

customer_reviews.title: Reebok Walk Ultra 6 DMX
customer_reviews.text: Best Walking Shoe ever, in my opinion. Been using them for over 25 years. Tried others. No comparison for comfort, durability and style. Thing is that Reebok uses a dozen or so similar product name descriptions that are OH SO Confusing, so just look for the DMX descriptor. It tells You that there are Air Chambers in the Heel and Toe area of the Sole of the Shoe. That's the Secret for the Comfort and a Great Walking Shoe. Also great for standing on your feet for long periods of time.
customer_reviews.author: OLDEESTUNES

customer_reviews.title: Seems sizes run different if made in a different country.
customer_reviews.text: I already own a black and a white pair of similar Reebok walking shoes that ran small enough that I had to exchage for a larger size. They were made in China. When I ordered and received these in the same larger size I tried them on and they had more room inside. Taking them off I noticed they came from Viet Nam. So far they look as I wanted and feel like they are almost broken in by comarison. I had to get the black and white pair a full size larger than my normal shoe size, these out of the box appear to be off by maybe half a size.
customer_reviews.author: Bill O

customer_reviews.title: Great So Far
customer_reviews.text: I have just worn these shoes a few times...I have only had them a week or so...but I really like them. They look great, are quite light and were comfortable right out of the box. I assume they will break in even further. I needed something comfortable but suitable for an evening at a restaurant or show where business/formal wear was not required but obvious athletic shoes were too dressed-down. These fill the bill perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: not what you'd expect
customer_reviews.text: these are shoes, not sneakers, so if you want a light weight sneaker this isn't it. The DMX system works great, but the insole offers no arch support and is horrible memory foam that looses it's memory very quickly. otherwise I like them fine !
customer_reviews.author: John Paul Fitzpatrick

customer_reviews.title: Good for some things, bad for others.
customer_reviews.text: 3.5 stars Kind of ugly honestly. They look about 70% orthopedic. Comfortable for 6-8 hour work shifts and normal everyday use. Just very long. Makes my foot huge. I've nearly tripped someone on 3 different occasions just standing near them. For whatever reason the top toecap area on my right shoe has a bad crease(?) like my toe is poking/bending higher up than the lef when stepping. Never happened in any shoe before. After working 12 hours on a factory floor the sides of my heels do feel sort of pinched.
customer_reviews.author: Will

customer_reviews.title: only 2 months
customer_reviews.text: only 2 months and both pairs are falling apart, I walk approx. 2 miles per day while at work and I alternate between the white and black pairs that were purchased at the same time. and the heals are "leaking" air when I take a step and the insole "memory foam" cushion is constantly sliding around under my feet when I walk. And Amazon won't return them!
customer_reviews.author: Thomas K.

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I wanted. Recommended.
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a pair of sturdy, comfortable, contemporary shoes for the race track (auto). My son races, and I work with him so I'm kneeling, running, standing, around oil and gasoline, etc. These shoes are well-made, fit the way I expected, and are super comfortable. Oil and other liquids wipe right off, and the tread stands up to solvents. I will definitely buy these again if needed: I expect 1-2 seasons and at this point see no reason to not get that life out of them. I like them.
customer_reviews.author: J. David Evans

customer_reviews.title: Great for wide feet (X-Wide)
customer_reviews.text: Used to be a big New Balance fan because their 4E shoes fit me well. Recently, they've become more narrow and just don't fit. These Reeboks actually fit my wide feet very nicely. The cushioned insert feels very comfy when walking (although it feels a bit strange when engaging the clutch on my car). Wish the heel area was just a tad narrower. Also, although the upper looks good, the sole when viewed from the side is perhaps not the prettiest. But hey, at least my feet don't hurt!
customer_reviews.author: gadget guru

customer_reviews.title: Ugly, but comfortable enuf for night work
customer_reviews.text: Well, I could tell from the photos that they were ugly, but I needed something black & comfortable for work (security), and the reviews weren’t too bad. In reality, they are truly ugly, but fit well enough, except for being a bit warm due to the padding. Been wearing a week now. Certainly not stylish. I should have returned them before wearing, but I wanted to actually try them. If I had it to do over again, I’d buy a better quality black sneaker which would look more sporty (my job requirement is simply that my shoes be dark). But I was trying to save a few bucks. They are functional, however, So I’ll continue to wear them.
customer_reviews.author: Guinness Hunter

customer_reviews.title: The Reebok DMX shoe line is my favorite. I have been wearing them for years
customer_reviews.text: These were for my brother he says: The Reebok DMX shoe line is my favorite. I have been wearing them for years. They are very comfortable and durable.
customer_reviews.author: Skiter

customer_reviews.title: Unstable
customer_reviews.text: This shoe have good cushion for the first month after that get uncomfortable. The bottom of the shoe is round like a boat which make it very unstable and make my feet twist in random direction. It’s not easy to find the perfect work/walking shoe and I’m still searching it!
customer_reviews.author: Borislav Donchev

customer_reviews.title: Dissappointed because of rounded bottoms
customer_reviews.text: Would love these shoes if the bottom was flat like most normal shoes. Because of the curved/rounded bottoms, they feel very unstable. I am worried that I will stumble or roll my ankle if I wear these. I don't understand why they would come up with such a stupid design. I wish I had noticed this in the pictures. I see at least one other person had the same complaint.
customer_reviews.author: Rick

customer_reviews.title: Super comfortable and lightweight
customer_reviews.text: My husband’s job requires him to stand fir the majority part of his 11 hour shift doing a lot of foot travel and his feet are always hurting but since he started wearing these shoes he says it feels like walking on a cloud. They have extensive padding and are super lightweight to walk on. So far he really likes these shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Chosen2008

customer_reviews.title: Best fit in years
customer_reviews.text: First lets just say I am cheep. I buy shoes on sale and these were at the top of my budget I usually give my self for shoes. That being said these are the most comfortable shoes I have had in years. I usually wear a 9.5 wide and many shoes are still very tight over the arch. These have good room and are holding up to my job (warehouse/construction sales) very well. Would recommend to anyone looking for a good walking shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Stumpydad

customer_reviews.title: Most Comfortable Sneakers I've Ever Had
customer_reviews.text: I'm very picky with the fit and comfort of my sneakers. When my favorite model of New Balance was no longer available, I went on the hunt for something new. After a lot of trial and error I tried out these Reeboks (thanks to Amazon's great multi-purchase/free return policy on shoes). These are by far the most comfortable sneakers I've ever owned. Super soft-- yet supportive-- insoles. I just ordered another identical pair to keep on the shelf for when these wear out. Highly recommended. I hope Reebok keeps this model going for a while.
customer_reviews.author: Bookworm

customer_reviews.title: Reebok Works For Me
customer_reviews.text: Ever since "athletic shoes" became a thing back when Reebok and Nike were fighting it out about whose design was better, I found Reebok's design worked for me significantly better than Nike. This one seems to be as usual, just what I need.
customer_reviews.author: H. Knapp

customer_reviews.title: Excellent. Customer for life!
customer_reviews.text: Husband works at a hospital and walks miles everyday. He is hard on shoes and these are holding up well after two months and still look great. He says they are THE most comfy "work" shoes he's had. Much more comfortable than the Sketchers it Mike's
customer_reviews.author: FashionStarr

customer_reviews.title: Comfort is number one in my book
customer_reviews.text: I had a pair of these that I purchased two years ago at an outlet store. Unfortunately our new pup decided to see how one of them tasted, it must taste pretty good. The damage was beyond any fix that I could do. So after searching within the Reebok system with no luck, I found these on Amazon of course. Just like the last pair, they are the most comfortable shoes that I own.
customer_reviews.author: Richard T. Morrow

customer_reviews.title: Feels great, looks good and fits my wide foot
customer_reviews.text: I ordered one size larger and x-wide as i usually have to do to get shoes wide enough. To my surprise, they are actually a little bit too big (not enough to return them!). I have had them on for an hour and walked around and so far, great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: narrow
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are narrower than the previous Reebok walk ultra dmx max shoes that I have been wearing over 10 years. Disappointing!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wide front gives comfort to the leg for a full day walk.
customer_reviews.text: I have been using DMX walk for over 10 years now, this is probably my 8th or 9th pairs I have used. The reason is simple, the air cushioning is just unbeatable. I find Sneaker brand cushioning similar to DMX, but their shows are not built for all weather walking. DMX Walk is still my preferred cushioned shoe for long trips (I usually takes 2 times/year x 21 days per trip). I do replace the insole with a CROC's insole to give even better cushioning.
customer_reviews.author: Shen Y.

customer_reviews.title: I ordered wide and these were very very narrow
customer_reviews.text: These shoes were not marked "wide" nor were they marked "2E." I wore them for 3 days and my feet hurt. Compared to the worn out shoes they replaced, they were obviously not wide. I returned them, so that was good.
customer_reviews.author: Bill Goodwine

customer_reviews.title: Surprised Hubby
customer_reviews.text: These were bought for my husband for Christmas because he had commented on having had a pair of Reebok sneakers that he had really liked. I took a chance, and I won! He was delighted!
customer_reviews.author: J. Etheredge

customer_reviews.title: the ONLY sneakers I will wear
customer_reviews.text: It's very hard to get this particular sneaker and so glad i did! Came sooner then planned and love them! My old feet need comfort since i work and on my feet 8 hrs a day!
customer_reviews.author: Lorraine Roberts

customer_reviews.title: No More Sore Feet at the End of the Day!
customer_reviews.text: Probably THE BEST SHOES I've Ever Wore! I'm a Nurse, on my Feet ALL DAY. wen I get off, my feet do NOT Ache. Finally, an all-day-comfortable shoe! Cant beat the price!
customer_reviews.author: Tremayne Bailey

customer_reviews.title: Reebok dmx sneakers
customer_reviews.text: Even though the soles are padded, they’re not as hood as the older dmx walking shoes. I needed heel protection and the older dmx sneakers provided that. These newer ones did not, but the cushion was prevalent along the entire length of the sole which did help with the ball of the foot. Don’t think this one is for me.
customer_reviews.author: Phil J Fry

customer_reviews.title: Good shoes.
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good shoes. A bit taller than I expected, but my last pair must have been low. It also feels like there's a ball on the mid point of the foot which really helps roll your foot forward through the step. Definitely a walking / running shoe.
customer_reviews.author: J. S. Wahl

customer_reviews.title: Walking on air
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are really comfortable for daily use. I wear orthotics, and they fit quite snugly. But I really like the cushioning under the sole; it feels like I have an extra bounce in my step.
customer_reviews.author: Shaul B

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy these.
customer_reviews.text: These were delivered on November 29, 2019. It is February 2nd, 2020. The outside of the shoe looks great. Inside. Not so much. There are holes in the material where the heel fits in the shoe. 2 months and 4 days later I am shopping for new shoes. Don't buy these if you work on your feet. 8 hrs a day. 5 days a week. Didn't last. I will never buy another Reebok again. Especially, this one.
customer_reviews.author: sam ronin

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable and look good too!!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these sneakers for my dad and he instantly loved them! very comfortable and they look nice too, not that orthopedic shoe look.My dad has had two hip surgeries and a replacement knee so these shoes will help him get around better so I’m super happy with the product!
customer_reviews.author: Gary Mercado

customer_reviews.title: Willing to Pay More for "Made in USA"
customer_reviews.text: Been buying these shoes for many years. But if, as other reviewers are saying, they're made in China these days, Reebok should realize Americans willingly pay more for products made in the US of A; and will purchase accordingly, MAGA
customer_reviews.author: William L. Willard, Sr.

customer_reviews.title: Stopped My Feet Hurting
customer_reviews.text: I had inflamed feet due to the siesmoid bone. The cushioning stopped the hurting within 24 hrs. Would highly recommend for anyone with feet that hurt.
customer_reviews.author: Kitman

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money spent
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable shoes, I'm all my feet all day walking the beat. These shoes have greatly reduced the pain in my feet, only thing is I wish they had a lil better arch support. Over all, great shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Airborne 96

customer_reviews.title: Reebok 4 vs Reebok 6 Mens' Walking Shoe
customer_reviews.text: Two different shoes. The 6 has a cantalever design that forces the foot, I presume into "proper alignment". This "balance" feature make the wearer aware of left to right movement if the stride is unnaturally unbalanced, ergo, a good walking shoe. I think I may like the upgrade
customer_reviews.author: D. L.

customer_reviews.title: Nice and wide but...
customer_reviews.text: Nice and wide but slightly longer than expected. If I went shorter then the width benefit would be lost. It just means my shoes have a weird fold and gap when tightening the laces. Other than the visual quirk, they fit great and my feet aren't at all constricted.
customer_reviews.author: zewkin

customer_reviews.title: Very good walking shoes
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable walking shoes for work. I work on concrete floor all day and my feet are hard to fit, but shoes do quite well and have good cushioning.
customer_reviews.author: One Claw

customer_reviews.title: Very cushiony shoe
customer_reviews.text: I love this shoe. If you have foot problems these shoes are great very well padded. I can walk 4 miles in these shoes. Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: zec attack

customer_reviews.title: Great on the doggies
customer_reviews.text: Great foot relief while walking about 9,000 steps per day at work. Fit true to size. Look nice. The sole has a bubble like half moon which creates a nice cushion with good arch support. I’m a big guy and these shoes do the job.
customer_reviews.author: Timekop

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable shoes, right away
customer_reviews.text: Have been wearing these shoes for years. Can go for a two mile walk on day one - no need to break them in, never a blister. Hope these will continue to be available.
customer_reviews.author: LaLaLou

customer_reviews.title: Ok
customer_reviews.text: They are too narrow. Also hard but they do keep my foot aligned . I might buy again but in a wider width
customer_reviews.author: D. Ortiz

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: Liked looks insole was great just , left foot was sore after trying. Maybe too big size.
customer_reviews.author: devona h.

customer_reviews.title: Air sole is super comfortable
customer_reviews.text: My third pair of these. Love these shoes. Extra wide fits good. Air sole is very comfortable though they will eventually "blow out".
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Darrell Frank

customer_reviews.title: Everyday wear, great value & comfort
customer_reviews.text: I've worn this style Reebok's for years. I hope Reebok continues to make this one. Comfortable for everyday, reasonable price, durable shoe. I recommend.
customer_reviews.author: AuntyJess

customer_reviews.title: The Best
customer_reviews.text: A still impressive derivative one of the most comfortable wearable daily shoes ever made/designed.
customer_reviews.author: C&D

customer_reviews.title: Well made and sturdy shoe. I like it but find it a ...
customer_reviews.text: Well made and sturdy shoe. I like it but find it a little stiff for walking, so I'm hoping as it breaks in that it will become more pliable. Not the most comfortable shoe I've had for walking, but I like Reebok so we'll see. Delivery and fit were excellent.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not all shoe sizes are that same, With there you may want to go a width wider than you usually take.
customer_reviews.text: I found these REEBOK DMX MAX a little tighter than the same size I bought in white a couple months ago. But with the Reebok DMX MAX air transfer system, they are still more comfortable than regular sneakers
customer_reviews.author: Steven

customer_reviews.title: Fit as expected
customer_reviews.text: Not as cushion-y as I had hoped, and I needed to break it in more than I am used to doing with other brands, but the size and color are what I had hoped for, Hoping it will last longer since it costs more than I usually spend on shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Christine Knisley

customer_reviews.title: Support, comfortable, toe room. Excellent shoe it actually makes me walk farther
customer_reviews.text: I've been looking for a really good, supportive walking shoes. These are fantastic. Very comfortable, you feel like your on air. If you have heel pain or discomfort in your feet, these are the shoe.
customer_reviews.author: ceaser

customer_reviews.title: The shoe is not WHITE
customer_reviews.text: The shoe shown in the on-line material looks white but in reality it is not WHITE. The tongue and shoelaces are white but the shoe body is off-white, sort of a grey/cream color. I have had many Reebok DMX shoes and they were all WHITE. I bought them at the Reebok outlet store but that closed so I bought over the internet. MISTAKE!!!
customer_reviews.author: BLW

customer_reviews.title: Shoe as expected
customer_reviews.text: Shoe fits well, looks nice - foot feels snug and comfy. Never had a walking shoe before - heel feels a little lower than general athletic shoe, so we'll see how that goes. So far, so good.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel A. Hohnstadt

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Love the shoes, but you should replace the insoles. They are cheap
customer_reviews.author: James L. Allen

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: I used Reebok Men's Walk Ultra V DMX Max Sneakers in many years. This model is very similar, I was unsure if it will be the same comfort as Ultra V DMX, but for me it is the same, no difference that I noticed. I can recommend this product and I will order agan for myself. No problems with ordering or shipment.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe at a great price.
customer_reviews.text: All I wear are Reebok shoes and this style I have worn for years.
customer_reviews.author: The Solarcouple

customer_reviews.title: Great walking shoes
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable, like walking on a cloud, great fit and stylish too
customer_reviews.author: Bruce E Balemian

customer_reviews.title: Great Walking Shoe
customer_reviews.text: I've been wearing the DMAX for years. Great fit, great for walking, arrived as promised and will order again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fitness shoe
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased. Great for working out or walking around town.
customer_reviews.author: Perry Lamont

customer_reviews.title: Love style
customer_reviews.text: Not quite as cushioned as I expected! I have the same shoe in a different style that's more comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Munger

customer_reviews.title: Seems to be good for walking
customer_reviews.text: I bought this shoe because I walk a lot and my Nikes fell apart earlier than I expected. So far this shoe seems to be holding up better.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Mohan Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and elevates pain
customer_reviews.text: I've been experiencing foot pain for several months just behind the toes in the ball the foot and these shoes are the only ones I can wear now other than crocs. They are extremely comfortable and highly recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Ebby

customer_reviews.title: The Best Walking Shoe
customer_reviews.text: Remains the best all around walking and cross training shoe available. Worth twice the cost. Holds up to washing well.
customer_reviews.author: shultho

customer_reviews.title: Good quality tennis shoe
customer_reviews.text: My husband likes the fit and that the shoes aren’t heavy.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Ramsey

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and good to walk in.
customer_reviews.text: I like these shoes. Takes the jolt out of waking on concrete. Good shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Fred

customer_reviews.title: Great looking shoes, on the town or work
customer_reviews.text: These fit like sneakers but look dressy. Comfortable to wear to work or on the town.
customer_reviews.author: Randy Helderman

customer_reviews.title: best shoe ever
customer_reviews.text: This is the best most comfortable walking shoe I've ever had. It looks great and can be worn to work as well as casually.
customer_reviews.author: DesertEagle50

customer_reviews.title: Love DMX Reebok
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are great for folks with bad knees. They have that air cushion and look and feel great.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Buckley

customer_reviews.title: Tom e tunes
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes 👍 very comfortable. But made in China. 🤔
customer_reviews.author: Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Could’ve been one size wider for better comfort
customer_reviews.text: Should’ve gotten shoe next size wider Tight fit, other than that it is good
customer_reviews.author: Dorthea Olgin

customer_reviews.title: good as my old ones
customer_reviews.text: they fit perfect ware good i like them.They make a difference in wearing these compared to other shoes i will continue to buy these.
customer_reviews.author: Ray G

customer_reviews.title: Comfy
customer_reviews.text: Had a pair years ago, lost them during a move...still the best walking/standing trainers ever
customer_reviews.author: David M.

customer_reviews.title: RIGHT SIZE!
customer_reviews.text: Great shoe! I ordered the correct size and it fits like a glove!
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves this brand and style of shoe. Great find! Looks great and feels good on his foot. He has alot of arthritis in his feet and these work well for him.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Wright

customer_reviews.title: Classic Reebok
customer_reviews.text: The product was exactly as I expected. The fit is exactly as expected as well I am pleased
customer_reviews.author: Ronnie

customer_reviews.title: Reebok shoes fit best
customer_reviews.text: 3rd pair reebok DMX I will buy 4 when the time comes.
customer_reviews.author: IBUY42

customer_reviews.title: If you walk a lot they wear a lot.
customer_reviews.text: One thing I dislike are the cushion inside wear out too soon. Comes untied too easy.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Brett D. Collins

customer_reviews.title: Excellent walking shoe.
customer_reviews.text: I have worn Reebok DMX walking shoes for years. One pair finally wore out. SO I bought these. I love the color and they work for me like all my other DMX walking shoes. The best walking shoes ever.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny Roark

customer_reviews.title: Gift for my son
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these sneakers for my son to wear for his clinical studies. He loves them and finds them to be comfortable. Especially for being in his feet for more than 8 hours.
customer_reviews.author: Savvy Shopper

customer_reviews.title: The air under your feet is perfect
customer_reviews.text: Walking 7 miles a night for a living these shoes proved to be the perfect solution
customer_reviews.author: Martin Herold

customer_reviews.title: Great walking sneaker
customer_reviews.text: Best walking sneaker ever have owned at least 6 prior pairs, excellent product highly recommend if feet hurt when walking.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: MAX CUSHION
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful, soft cushion soles. Feels great for exercise or just walking the mall.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fits perfectly -- But expensive
customer_reviews.text: These are the most expensive shoes I'v ever purchased, but worth every cent. I was able to order size 13 and extra wide. That's not easy to find. They are very well made, seem very durable, and stylish. Also, they are extremely comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Sitter

customer_reviews.title: Improved DMX walk
customer_reviews.text: Much improved from previous DMX Walk sneakers. Lighter and feels a little roomier too. Great for working / walking on concrete floors for 12 hrs.
customer_reviews.author: Dana S.

customer_reviews.title: DMX is the real deal !
customer_reviews.text: Used at work at a retail liquor store. Best shoes I have had for comfort for standing on my feet for long period of time.
customer_reviews.author: Riles

customer_reviews.title: Shoes
customer_reviews.text: Hard to find. I've been wearing this style for 20 years. No other shoe fits me as well
customer_reviews.author: RONALD K SOWERBY

customer_reviews.title: Reebok still makes a great walking sneaker
customer_reviews.text: Reebok still makes a great walking sneaker. DMX MAX is very comfortable and light weight. Been using there walking sneakers since 1999. Never a problem.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas M.

customer_reviews.title: Slim fit!
customer_reviews.text: I was hoping of getting 9 1/2 wide Reebok sneakers I order, but I recieved 9 1/2E instead. But it fits.
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: Good "Sneaker"
customer_reviews.text: The sole on these shoes are built up a little bit, and I sensed more comfort on my walk (walk about 4 times a week, one hour each walk). Well, compared to other walking footgear, including Skechers, these were a good buy. Fit is spot on.
customer_reviews.author: paul higgins

customer_reviews.title: Most compfortable!
customer_reviews.text: I've been wearing Reebok DMX forever. They fit me perfect. True to size. So happy I can get them on Amazon. Hard to find in stores. Great walking shoe. Gave the highest rating!
customer_reviews.author: Tracy

customer_reviews.title: comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I go thru 2 pr per year. I had bought other brands last couple years because they were cheaper. Glad to spend a little more and get the Reeboks.
customer_reviews.author: Terrence Palmer

customer_reviews.title: Cushiony
customer_reviews.text: Cushiony. I use them to run in because of osteoarthritis
customer_reviews.author: George W. Shorago

customer_reviews.title: product good
customer_reviews.text: the correct size and gender of DMX is good. simply had a mix up
customer_reviews.author: noel catherine albes

customer_reviews.title: reebok shoes
customer_reviews.text: I have been wearing dmx shoes for years love then. Not many stores carry them.
customer_reviews.author: Wayne Critser

customer_reviews.title: Try again.
customer_reviews.text: It is an strong shoes, for me is not suitable to run.
customer_reviews.author: Jose Ferrer

customer_reviews.title: great sneakers
customer_reviews.text: normally love these but they run too narrow had to reorder a wide
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love my older DMXs
customer_reviews.text: Get shoes, I have nerve problems with feet, these do help with the problem.. Love them!
customer_reviews.author: me4ku

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable but run long
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable for walking and standing a lot at work but run long. Had to get some fillers for my heels. I wear a men's 7 in my Nike running shoes but these are a little long.
customer_reviews.author: Caleb LaFeve

product_meta.title: Reebok Men's Walk Ultra 6 DMX Max Sneaker
product_meta.description: The Reebok walk ultra 6 DMX max shoe has an upper of leather and textile for protection and breathability. Eva foam provides a responsive feel, and a memory tech sockliner comforts each step. DMX max technology moves air from heel to toe, providing maximum volume cushioning. A rubber outsole adds grip.
